title: switching email
body:
i forgot my previous email address ... now i cant login to my email and cant change it.. 
 my account is ok... i just want to change email address.. any idea what to do ?

replies.body: Our account team can help with updating your info!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll take a look directly and fix that up for you.
